descriptionlist.description:
The tweak will allow you to use the Touch ID sensor for gestures.
Current gestures: - Tap - Hold - Double tap - Triple tap - Tap and hold
Current actions: - Lock - Home - Multitask - Flashlight - Screenshot - Release screen - Go to last app - Siri - Orientation lock - Control Center - Action Center - Close the current app
If your device turns off, you don't lift your finger fast enough. Set a higher timeout or change the touch action.
If there is no vibration, make sure you enable it in Settings -> Sounds.
Currently Bioprotect does not work correctly with this tweak, it will be fixed soon.
